item.title: 瑞银认为美国新制裁后石油市场短期波动，供应过剩限制涨势
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS）周四表示，美国和欧盟针对俄罗斯能源企业的新制裁措施可能会给原油价格带来短期波动，但由于全球石油市场供过于求，不太可能引发原油价格的持续反弹。【原文：UBS said on Thursday that fresh U.S. and EU sanctions targeting Russian energy firms could introduce short-term volatility to crude prices but are unlikely to spark a sustained rally due to oversupply in the global oil market.】

item.title: MTU 航空发动机公司因商业需求而实现超预期利润
item.description: MTU 航空发动机公司（MTU Aero Engines）周四公布的第三季度调整后营业利润超出市场预期，原因是其商用发动机业务和商用维护业务的收入增长有助于缓解美国关税的影响。【原文：MTU Aero Engines reported a third-quarter adjusted operating profit that beat market expectations on Thursday, as revenue growth in its commercial engine business and commercial maintenance helped cushion the impact of U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 龙沙确认前景，预计未来数月将签订更多合同
item.description: 瑞士合同药品生产商龙沙（Lonza）周四确认了其全年指导目标，此前该公司的主要合同研发与生产组织（CDMO）业务在第三季度表现强劲。【原文：Swiss contract drug manufacturer Lonza confirmed its full-year guidance on Thursday after a strong third quarter for its main contract development and manufacturing organization (CDMO) business.】

item.title: 瑞典电信公司第三季度核心利润略超预期
item.description: 瑞典电信运营商泰利（Telia）周四公布的第三季度核心盈利略高于市场预期，主要得益于服务收入的盈利性增长和大部分市场运营费用的下降。【原文：Swedish telecom operator Telia reported third-quarter core earnings slightly above market expectations on Thursday, driven by profitable service revenue growth and lower operational expenses across most of its markets.】

item.title: 特斯拉盈利不佳，欧洲股市下跌 4
item.description: 特斯拉股价周四在法兰克福早盘交易中下跌近 4%，此前该公司的季度利润因关税和研究成本以及监管信贷收入下降而不及华尔街预期。【原文：Tesla's shares fell nearly 4% in early Frankfurt trading on Thursday, after the company's quarterly profit missed Wall Street expectations due to tariff and research costs, as well as a drop in income from regulatory credits.】

item.title: 劳埃德汽车金融丑闻缠身，利润下降 36%，下调指导评级
item.description: 劳埃德银行集团（Lloyds Banking Group）周四表示，该集团第三季度利润下降了 36%，并下调了今年的业绩指引，原因是此前宣布的为汽车金融不当销售丑闻向客户提供赔偿的 8 亿英镑费用。【原文：Lloyds Banking Group said on Thursday its third quarter profit fell 36% and it downgraded its performance guidance for the year, hurt by a previously announced 800 million pound charge to compensate customers for the motor-finance mis-selling scandal.】

item.title: 多芬香皂制造商联合利华季度销售额超出预期
item.description: 本周四，联合利华第三季度基本销售额增长超出市场预期，主要得益于其美容产品在北美和新兴市场的强劲表现。【原文：Unilever's third-quarter underlying sales growth topped market expectations on Thursday, driven by strength in its beauty products across North America and emerging markets.】

item.title: 聚焦：L&G 首席执行官表示，英国预算担忧为 L&G 改革蒙上阴影
item.description: Legal & General 首席执行官安东尼奥-西莫斯（Antonio Simoes）告诉路透社记者，英国绝不能在下个月的预算案中通过税收改革来阻止养老金储蓄者，他还补充说，英国最大的投资者正在努力推销自己的战略，不确定性正在削弱投资。【原文：Britain must not deter pension savers with tax changes in next month's budget, Legal & General CEO Antonio Simoes told Reuters, adding that uncertainty was souring investment as the UK's biggest investor battles to sell its own strategy.】

item.title: 由于订单强劲，贝西公司第四季度销售额增加
item.description: 必益半导体工业公司（Besi）周四表示，由于预订量增加，预计第四季度销售额将比上一季度有所增长。【原文：BE Semiconductor Industries (Besi) said on Thursday it expects its fourth-quarter sales to rise compared to the previous one due to higher bookings.】

item.title: 荷兰芯片制造商通知日本汽车零部件制造商供应可能中断
item.description: 日本汽车制造商协会周四表示，一家荷兰半导体制造商已通知日本汽车零部件制造商，它可能无法保证芯片的交付。【原文：A Dutch semiconductor manufacturer has notified Japanese automobile component makers that it may not be able to guarantee chip deliveries, the Japan Automobile Manufacturers Association said on Thursday.】

item.title: 喜力在 2030 年计划中将收入增长目标定为中等个位数
item.description: 荷兰啤酒制造商喜力周四表示，其目标是在 2030 年之前每年实现中等个位数的有机净收入增长，并在此之前实现利润增长。【原文：Dutch brewer Heineken said on Thursday it aims to deliver mid-single-digit organic net revenue growth each year until 2030, with profit growth ahead of that, as it laid out an updated strategic vision covering the next five years ahead of an investor event later in the day.】

item.title: 诺基亚缩减风险基金投资，业绩超出预期
item.description: 芬兰电信设备制造商诺基亚周四公布的第三季度利润远超预期，该公司表示将减少被动风险基金投资。【原文：Finnish telecoms equipment maker Nokia reported third-quarter profit well ahead of expectations on Thursday as it said it will scale down its passive venture fund investments.】

item.title: 意法半导体第四季度销售额继续保持增长势头
item.description: 意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics）周四表示，预计第四季度的销售额将比本季度有所增长，这表明其主要市场在经历多年低迷之后出现了持续复苏。【原文：STMicroelectronics , on Thursday said that it expected sales to rise in the fourth quarter compared with the current quarter, showing evidence of a sustained recovery after a multi-year downturn in its main markets.】

item.title: 削减成本抵消关税和价格竞争，沃尔沃汽车第三季度利润微增
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周四报告称，尽管关税和激烈的竞争使大幅削减成本计划的实施速度超过预期，但该公司第三季度调整后利润仍有小幅增长。【原文：Volvo Cars reported on Thursday a small rise in adjusted profit for the third quarter despite tariffs and tough competition as a drastic cost-cutting programme delivered faster than expected.】

item.title: 欧洲公司同意合并卫星以对抗 Starlink
item.description: 欧洲航空航天集团周四公布了一项初步协议，将合并其亏损的卫星制造业务，经过数月谈判后联合起来，共同对抗以埃隆-马斯克的星链公司（Starlink）为首的竞争对手的迅猛发展。【原文：European aerospace groups unveiled a preliminary deal on Thursday to pool their loss-making satellite manufacturing activities, combining forces after months of negotiations to counter the runaway growth of rivals led by Elon Musk's Starlink.】

item.title: 软件公司达索季度收入稳定，低于预期
item.description: 法国软件制造商达索系统公司（Dassault Systemes）周四公布的第三季度总收入稳定，略低于市场预期。【原文：French software maker Dassault Systemes reported stable total revenue in the third quarter on Thursday, slightly below market estimates.】

item.title: 美元疲软拖累销售，罗氏仍上调指导价
item.description: 瑞士制药商罗氏公司周四上调了全年利润指导，尽管九个月的销售额受汇率影响低于预期。【原文：Swiss drugmaker Roche on Thursday lifted its full-year profit guidance, even after nine-month sales were burdened by foreign exchange effects to come in below expectations.】

item.title: 索迪斯预测 2026 年收入增长放缓，原因是美国面临挑战
item.description: 法国餐饮企业索迪斯周四预计，2026 年的收入增长将低于 2025 年，理由是其美国业务面临挑战。【原文：French caterer Sodexo on Thursday forecast slower revenue growth in 2026 than in 2025, citing challenges in its U.S. business.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴推出人工智能聊天机器人服务，再次向消费者发力
item.description: 阿里巴巴周四推出了一项新的人工智能聊天机器人助手服务，再次向由字节跳动和腾讯主导的面向消费者的领域发起冲击。【原文：Alibaba launched a new AI chatbot assistant service on Thursday, refreshing its push into a consumer-facing space that is dominated by ByteDance and Tencent .】

item.title: 早间竞标菜单上又出现了 "肉类之外 "的菜肴
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter】

item.title: 独家报道消息称Nexperia中国部门恢复向国内分销商销售芯片
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，荷兰芯片制造商 Nexperia 的中国业务部门已恢复向当地经销商供应半导体产品。【原文：Dutch chipmaker Nexperia's Chinese unit has resumed supplying semiconductors to local distributors, according to two people briefed on the matter, having previously halted all shipments when Beijing banned exports following an ownership dispute.】

item.title: 新西兰议会将就青少年社交媒体禁令展开辩论
item.description: 新西兰官员周四表示，将向新西兰议会提交一项限制 16 岁以下儿童使用社交媒体的法案，为议会防止青少年在上网时受到伤害的努力造势。【原文：A bill to restrict social media for children under 16 will be introduced in the New Zealand parliament, officials said on Thursday, building momentum for parliament's efforts to prevent young people from being harmed while online.】

item.title: 特朗普打击移民，印度塔塔科技公司将在美国雇佣更多当地人
item.description: 塔塔科技公司（Tata Technologies）的顶头上司表示，该公司将在美国招募更多当地国民，因为这家印度工程服务提供商正在对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）大范围的移民打压做出反应。【原文：Tata Technologies will recruit more local nationals in the United States, its top boss said, as the Indian engineering services provider reacts to U.S. President Donald Trump's wide-ranging immigration crackdown.】

item.title: 媒体报道，佐治亚州州长坎普访问韩国，会见现代集团和 LG 公司官员
item.description: 据《Maeil Business Newspaper》周四报道，美国佐治亚州州长布莱恩-坎普（Brian Kemp）计划本周会见韩国商界领袖，包括现代汽车和 LG Energy Solution 的高管。【原文：Brian Kemp, the governor of the U.S. state of Georgia, plans to meet with South Korean business leaders this week, including executives from Hyundai Motor and LG Energy Solution, months after an immigration raid in the state detained hundreds of Korean workers, the Maeil Business Newspaper said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国可能对中国采取新的贸易遏制措施，亚洲市场出现回落
item.description: 亚洲股市周四连续第二天下跌，原因是科技大盘股乏善可陈的财报加深了华尔街的跌势，而美国对俄罗斯和中国的制裁则加剧了人们对地缘政治的担忧。石油价格飙升。【原文：Asian stocks fell for a second day on Thursday as lacklustre earnings reports from tech megacap stocks deepened a selloff on Wall Street, while U.S. sanctions against Russia and China revived fears around geopolitics. Oil prices surged.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，特朗普政府正在洽谈入股量子计算公司事宜
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府正在与几家量子计算公司洽谈入股以换取联邦资金的事宜。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration is in talks with several quantum-computing companies to take equity stakes in exchange for federal funding, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美元在 CPI 和贸易消息公布前走高；日元下滑
item.description: 周四，美元兑其他主要货币走高，交易商在等待周五推迟公布的美国消费者通胀数据，同时消化华盛顿和中国政府之间的关税威胁。【原文：The dollar drifted higher against its major peers on Thursday as traders waited on the delayed release of U.S. consumer inflation data on Friday, while digesting tariff threats between Washington and Beijing.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Polymarket 寻求估值高达 150 亿美元的融资
item.description: 彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道称，Polymarket 正在与投资者进行早期讨论，希望以 120 亿至 150 亿美元的估值筹集资金。【原文：Polymarket is in early discussions with investors and looking to raise funds at a valuation between $12 billion and $15 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 必和必拓表示澳大利亚冶金煤业务将面临 "艰难抉择
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）周四表示，如果没有监管改革的支持，该公司将被迫对其在澳大利亚的冶金煤业务做出 "艰难的决定"。【原文：BHP Group said on Thursday it would be forced to take 'difficult decisions' for its metallurgical coal business in Australia if there were no regulatory changes to support it.】

item.title: 美国对俄罗斯顶级石油公司实施制裁，欧盟对俄罗斯液化天然气实施禁令
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三对俄罗斯实施了与乌克兰有关的制裁，这是他第二个任期内首次针对石油公司卢克石油公司（Lukoil）和俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft）实施制裁，因为他在战争问题上对俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）的不满情绪正在加深。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday imposed Ukraine-related sanctions on Russia for the first time in his second term, targeting oil companies Lukoil and Rosneft as his frustration grows with Russian President Vladimir Putin over the war.】
